TextView.android:text: About MySitter Community MySitter initiated at 2021 by Netanel Haim Pour and Omer Borshan during their Computer Science B.Sc. The application offers two major services: Dogsitting, Babysitting. We let people use our platform without registration – they can choose the best sitter in town. If you want to join our community – you can register and offer your services, freely. We believe that people believe in people. Hence, you can use real people recommendations in order to choose what’s best for you. See you in the streets!
